mapper.select: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS NUM, SUBJECT, WRITER, REG_DATE, READCOUNT FROM BOARD ORDER BY NUM DESC LIMIT #{minLimit}, #{maxLimit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(num),0)+1 FROM BOARD b), #{writer}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{passwd}, NOW(),0,0,0,0, #{content},'100.100.100.100')
INSERT INTO USER(NUM, ID, PASSWD, EMAIL, NAME, NICK) VALUES ((SELECT ifnull(MAX(num),0)+1 FROM USER u),#{id},#{passwd},#{email},#{name},#{nick})
mapper.select: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * FROM USER ORDER BY num DESC
